title: B.Tech (Hons.) in Computer Science and Engineering
name: GLA University
description: Part of a team responsible for maintaining a system that aids Dell Technologies' customer-facing operations. My contributions encompass developing comprehensive unit tests to ensure code integrity, executing regression testing tasks to ensure the system works as expected, and implementing feature enhancements and modifications in alignment with stakeholder specifications.

title: Intermediate Education

description: I architected a scalable system for rapid deployment, making key decisions on cloud infrastructure, database management, and design paradigms. Collaborated with frontend engineers for seamless integration, implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for automated build, test, and deployment processes.

title: Higher Secondary Education
